key.name: show-hud
key.description: Make the HUD appear with this key

key.name: launcher-hide-mode
key.description: Make the launcher hide automatically after some time of inactivity: always or just when the focussed window is not over the launcher (0 = Never, 1 = Autohide)

key.name: reveal-trigger
key.description: (0 = Left Edge, 1 = Top Left Corner)

key.name: show-launcher
key.description: Make the launcher appear with that key

key.name: keyboard-focus
key.summary: Key to put keyboard-focus on launcher
key.description: Set the keyboard-focus on the launcher so it can be navigated with the cursor-keys

key.name: execute-command
key.description: Key to open a folder or execute a command

key.name: panel-first-menu
key.summary: Key to open the first panel menu
key.description: Open the first menu on the panel, allowing keyboard navigation thereafter.

key.name: launcher-switcher-forward
key.summary: Key to start the launcher application switcher
key.description: Switch the applications using the launcher

key.name: launcher-switcher-prev
key.summary: Key to start the launcher application switcher in reverse
key.description: Switch the applications using the launcher, in reverse order

key.name: alt-tab-timeout
key.summary: Automatically grid windows on timer in switcher
key.description: After a short time, spread multiple windows of the same application out into a grid

key.name: alt-tab-bias-viewport
key.summary: Bias alt-tab to prefer windows on the current viewport
key.description: Bias the switcher to windows which are placed on the current viewport

key.name: alt-tab-forward
key.description: Start switching between windows

key.name: alt-tab-prev
key.summary: Key to start the switcher in reverse
key.description: Start switching between windows in reverse order

key.name: alt-tab-forward-all
key.summary: Key to start the switcher for all viewports
key.description: Start switching between windows on all viewports

key.name: alt-tab-prev-all
key.summary: Key to start the switcher in reverse for all viewports
key.description: Start switching between windows on all viewports, in reverse order

key.name: alt-tab-right
key.description: Navigate one window right in the switcher

key.name: alt-tab-left
key.description: Navigate one window left in the switcher

key.name: alt-tab-detail-start
key.summary: Key to expose the windows in the switcher
key.description: Display a preview of the selected window; grid if there is multiple windows of that application

key.name: alt-tab-detail-stop
key.summary: Key to collapse windows in the switcher
key.description: Return the previews to icons in the switcher

key.name: alt-tab-next-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the switcher
key.description: Flip through all the windows present in the switcher

key.name: alt-tab-prev-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the switcher backwards
key.description: Flip through all the windows present in the switcher, in reverse order

key.name: show-minimized-windows
key.description: Hack to enable minimized windows in switcher. Disable and report bugs if problems are caused

key.name: background-color
key.description: Background color override used for testing purposes

key.name: backlight-mode
key.description: Change how the icons are backlit (0 = Backlight Always On, 1 = Backlight Toggles, 2 = Backlight Always Off, 3 = Edge Illumination Toggles, 4 = Backlight and Edge Illumination Toggles)

key.name: launch-animation
key.description: Animation played when a launcher icon is in the process of spawning a process (0 = None, 1 = Pulse Until Running, 2 = Blink)

key.name: urgent-animation
key.description: Animation played when a launcher icon is in the urgent state (0 = None, 1 = Pulse, 2 = Wiggle)

key.name: panel-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Panel background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: panel-opacity-maximized-toggle
key.summary: Panel Opacity for Maximized Windows Toggle.
key.description: When a window is maximized and visible in the current viewport, the panel opacity is disabled

key.name: launcher-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Launcher background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the launcher icons (32 - 64)

key.name: edge-responsiveness
key.description: A conglomerate setting that modifies the overall responsiveness of the launcher reveal (0.2 - 8.0)

key.name: reveal-pressure
key.description: Amount of mouse pressure required to reveal launcher (1 - 1000)

key.name: overcome-pressure
key.description: Amount of mouse pressure required to push into the next monitor (1 - 1000)

key.name: decay-rate
key.description: The rate at which mouse pressure decays (1 - 1000)

key.name: stop-velocity
key.description: The maximum velocity at which the mouse will still be stopped (1 - 1000)

key.name: autohide-animation
key.description: Animation played when the launcher is showing or hiding (0 = Fade on bfb and Slide, 1 = Slide only, 2 = Fade only, 3 = Fade and Slide)

key.name: dash-blur-experimental
key.description: Type of blur in the Dash (0 = No Blur, 1 = Static Blur, 2 = Active Blur)

key.name: automaximize-value
key.description: The minimum value to trigger automaximize. (1 - 100)

key.name: devices-option
key.description: Show devices in the launcher (0 = Never, 1 = Only Mounted, 2 = Always)

key.name: shortcut-overlay
key.description: Enable Shortcut Hints Overlay

key.name: show-desktop-icon
key.description: Enable/Disable "Show Desktop Icon" in the launcher.

key.name: menus-fadein
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-fadeout
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-discovery-duration
key.description: How many seconds the menus should be shown when a new application has been launched. (0 - 10)

key.name: menus-discovery-fadein
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-discovery-fadeout
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown. (0 - 1000)

key.name: num-launchers
key.description: Monitors on which launchers will be displayed (0 = All Desktops, 1 = Primary Desktop)

key.name: launcher-capture-mouse
key.description: Determines if the launcher edges should capture the mouse
